oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Photomontage of supporters of a dying veteran, a wedding, celebrities watching a parade, a children performing in Nashville, people outside an exploded mine, a ship, an author, and three ads. Nashville Banner, 1931 January 18.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Joffre, Marshal Joseph; Boatwright Jr., Mrs. Herbert Lee; Pollard, John G.; Pollard, Suzanne; Einstein, Albert; Einstein, Mrs. Albert; Dinkins, Doris; Jackson, Milbry; Kelley, Helen; Raby, Mary Paul; Russell, Dorothy; Reese, Walter; Hutchinson, Loretta; Mattei, Ottavia; Halloran, Beatrice; Wallace, Marguerite; Strobel, Robert; Walker, Mary Frances; Power, Dorothy; Formosa, Pete; McDonald, Helen; Conner, Harriet Ann; Mulloy, Mary Agnes; Campbell, Bernice M.; Grey, Zane

oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Photomontage of supporters of a dying French World War I veteran, a wedding at the Virginia governor's mansion, Albert Einstein and his wife watching a parade, a children performing in Nashville, people outside an exploded Ohio mine, a ship, an author, and three ads. 16 x 21.5 in. Forms part of the Nashville Newspaper Rotogravure Digital Images Collection.
